attributes.action: Ensure everybody pays NOT just the usual honest people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you had to show your insurance detatils every time you wanted petrol. This would catch all the people who drive around without any cover and thus your revenue would improve dramatically. The onus would then be held by the petrol companies to ensure all revenue should be collected properly.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
